overview: Quentin Gainz and boyfriend Roman Todd are looking to hire some help around the house, and when they stumble across Tyler Carver's application, they are pretty sure they've found their main. Lance Ford and Chris Blades tell Markie More and Damien Kyle about swinging, where couples share each other, and Markie and Damien kind of perk up at the thought! Lance Ford is always down for some fun, and today, Clark Campbell and Luis Parker have a surprise for him. Dakota Young is hoping the resort atmosphere will help boyfriend Scoty Zee to loosen up a little and have some fun, and when he sees fellow guest Michael Del Ray he knows he is right!
title: The Bareback Boys
